sentences.en: A minibus is trapped on an ice - covered road in Chenzhou, Hunan province.
sentences.cn: 一辆小巴被困在湖南郴州一条被冰覆盖的公路上.

sentences.en: He was then taken by minibus to the military base.
sentences.cn: 接着他被小型公共汽车带到了军事基地。

sentences.en: I am tell this minibus can go jar on very little petrol.
sentences.cn: 我听说这种小客车能靠很少汽油开很多路.

sentences.en: I want to hire a minibus for our summer camp in August.
sentences.cn: 我想为我们八月份的夏令营租一辆小型公共汽车.

sentences.en: Jane goes to school by underground, then minibus, then on foot.
sentences.cn: 简乘地铁, 然后乘小型公交车, 然后步行去学校.

sentences.en: Militants also opened fire on a minibus carrying telecommunication employees to work.
sentences.cn: 武装分子同时也向一辆载着电信员工去上班的中巴车开了枪.

sentences.en: Minibus prices continue to work with the previous month.
sentences.cn: 微型客车价格继续与上月持平.

sentences.en: One group of journalists were crowded into a minibus.
sentences.cn: 一群记者挤进一辆小型公共汽车。

sentences.en: The children go to school in a minibus.
sentences.cn: 孩子们乘小型公共汽车上学.

sentences.en: The club bought a minibus which can carry 14 people.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部买了一辆可乘十四人的面包车.

sentences.en: The minibus will sit ten people.
sentences.cn: 这辆小型巴士可坐十人.

sentences.en: The schoolboy was knocked down by a minibus when crossing the street.
sentences.cn: 那名男生在穿过街道时让一辆小公共汽车撞倒了.

sentences.en: They bought a new minibus with the proceeds from the auction.
sentences.cn: 他们用拍卖得来的钱买了一辆新面包车.

sentences.en: Three black people were killed by shots fired at random from a minibus.
sentences.cn: 3名黑人被从一辆面包车里胡乱射出的子弹打死了。

sentences.en: Three people were killed by shots fired at random from a minibus.
sentences.cn: 3个人被从一辆面包车中发射的乱弹打死了。

sentences.en: Were there any witnesses who saw the minibus run over that kid?
sentences.cn: 是否有目击者看见那辆中巴轧了那个小孩?

words.tran_cn: [计] 小型计算机；微型电脑
使小型化；使微型化（等于miniaturise）
面包车（等于microbus）；小型公共汽车；中客车

trans.tran_en: a small bus with seats for six to twelve people
